original_title: A Senior CIA officer for 30 years confirms the psychological operations they use overseas were turned against Donald Trump and the American People to keep Democrats in power  — The Donald
article_summary: A retired senior CIA officer has confirmed that psychological operations used overseas were allegedly turned against Donald Trump and the American people to maintain Democratic power, with the Smith-Mundt Act of 2013 being a key factor in enabling propaganda on news and airwaves. This has sparked discussions about the need to revoke or restore the act, with concerns about societal issues being traced back to it.</s>
